plugins.name: Wally Accessibility Checker
plugins.description:
Looking for an easy way to make your designs accessible without compromising creativity?

Our all-new plugin makes it simple to instantly add accessibility to your designs, allowing you to focus on what matters most—creating outstanding user interfaces that are usable by all.

Automatically detect and resolve a wide range of accessibility issues, eliminating the need for manual compliance checks. With real-time feedback, your designs are accessible from the start, saving you both time and effort.

By prioritizing accessibility from the beginning, you’ll create impactful, user-friendly designs that engage and serve every user. Creating visually compelling, fully inclusive designs has never been easier.
plugins.tagline: Create accessible designs with ease

plugins.name: Layer Formatter
plugins.description:
Streamline your design-to-development workflow with Layer Formatter, a powerful tool that simplifies layer renaming. Whether you need hyphens, underscores, camel case, or kebab case, this tool ensures your layers align perfectly with coding conventions.


Say goodbye to messy names and hello to clean, developer-friendly files. Perfect for effortless handoff and collaboration!


✨ Key Features ✨


  1. Auto-Space Conversion: Automatically replace spaces in layer names with underscores (_) or remove them entirely for clean, code-friendly naming.
  2. Batch Rename Layers: Rename multiple layers in seconds, saving time and improving efficiency.
  3. Flexible Naming Styles: Supports hyphens, underscores, camel case, kebab case, and more to fit your coding standards.
  4. Instant Updates: Apply changes with a single click—no need for tedious manual edits.
  5. Streamlined Handoff: Deliver developer-ready files with consistent, clean layer names for seamless collaboration.
plugins.tagline: Rename layers for seamless developer handoff

plugins.name: Death 2 Lorem
plugins.description:
A generative AI Quick Actions plugin:

  1. It just works – no API keys or account needed. Really.
  2. Stay in flow with a lightning fast Quick Actions keyboard UX.
  3. Let it rip with smart prompt templates or write your own.


Tracks:

  1. Generate -> axe the Lorem, never bore 'em
  2. Rewrite -> shred bad copy and make your design sing
  3. Translate -> your design, now on a world tour


What’s coming next:

  1. Moar templates
  2. Multi-select support
  3. Even faster text generation
  4. Maybe a UI. Maybe.


No signup or account needed. No API key needed. Roadie version coming with premium features later – if you want em’. ✌️
plugins.tagline: Lorem is dead. Design faster with real text content.

plugins.name: Text Style Usage Analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze and visualize the usage of text styles in your Figma project. This plugin lists all text styles (even unused ones), sorts them by usage, and displays a bar chart next to each style. Green bars indicate high usage, yellow for medium, and red for zero usage. Perfect for cleaning up unused styles and optimizing your design system.

plugins.name: CopyMate - Smarter, Faster, Better Copywriting
plugins.description:
Streamline your copywriting process without leaving Figma. CopyMate helps designers and writers enhance, translate, and refine UX copy in seconds while maintaining clarity, brand tone, and design consistency.


Enhance your copywriting ✍️

Improve writing quality with AI-powered suggestions that:

- Align with brand guidelines

- Improve clarity and readability

- Preserve original capitalization


Shorten Text Without Losing Meaning ✂️

Make text more concise while keeping intent and usability intact—perfect for button labels, tooltips, and UI elements.


Translate Text Instantly 🌍

Convert selected text into multiple languages while preserving formatting.


How CopyMate works

1. Select one or more text layers

2. Run CopyMate from the Figma plugin menu

3. Choose an action: Translate, Enhance, Shorten, or Quality Check

4. Review & Apply your changes instantly


Try CopyMate now and supercharge your copywriting workflow! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Smarter, Faster, Better Copywriting

plugins.name: Find Components
plugins.description:
このFigmaプラグイン「Find Components」は、選択した複数のレイヤーの中からメインコンポーネント/インスタンスを効率的に選出するのに役立ちます。


主な機能：

  1. メインコンポーネント/インスタンスの絞り込み： 選択したレイヤーの中から、メインコンポーネント/インスタンスのみを抽出して選択できます。
  2. 選択対象の切り替え： ドロップダウンメニューから、メインコンポーネント/インスタンスのどちらを選択対象とするかを選択できます。
  3. グループ化されたレイヤーにも対応： グループ化されたレイヤーの奥深くにネストされたコンポーネント/インスタンスも探し出して選択できます。
  4. 処理のキャンセル： 実行処理が重い場合でも、途中で処理をキャンセルできます。


このプラグインは、以下のような場面で役立ちます：

  1. - デザインシステムの整理： 大量のコンポーネント/インスタンスの中から、特定のものを効率的に見つけたい場合。
  2. デザインの更新： 複数のインスタンスをまとめてメインコンポーネントにリンクさせたい場合。
  3. 共同作業： チームメンバーが作成したコンポーネントやインスタンスを、効率的に把握したい場合。


---


This Figma plugin, "Find Components," helps you efficiently select main components or instances from multiple selected layers.


Key features:

  1. Component/Instance filtering: You can extract and select only main components or instances from the selected layers.
  2. Selection target switching: You can choose whether to target main components or instances from the dropdown menu.
  3. Support for grouped layers: You can find and select components or instances nested deep within grouped layers.
  4. Process cancellation: You can cancel the process midway if the execution process is heavy.


This plugin is useful in the following situations:

  1. Organizing design systems: When you want to efficiently find specific components or instances from a large number of them.
  2. Updating designs: When you want to link multiple instances to the main component at once.
  3. Collaboration: When you want to efficiently understand the components and instances created by team members.

  2. デザインの更新： 複数のインスタンスをまとめてメインコンポーネントにリンクさせたい場合。
  3. 共同作業： チームメンバーが作成したコンポーネントやインスタンスを、効率的に把握したい場合。


---


This Figma plugin, "Find Components," helps you efficiently select main components or instances from multiple selected layers.


Key features:

  1. Component/Instance filtering: You can extract and select only main components or instances from the selected layers.
  2. Selection target switching: You can choose whether to target main components or instances from the dropdown menu.
  3. Support for grouped layers: You can find and select components or instances nested deep within grouped layers.
  4. Process cancellation: You can cancel the process midway if the execution process is heavy.


This plugin is useful in the following situations:

  1. Organizing design systems: When you want to efficiently find specific components or instances from a large number of them.
  2. Updating designs: When you want to link multiple instances to the main component at once.
  3. Collaboration: When you want to efficiently understand the components and instances created by team members.
133395.release_notes:
- Changed to collect main components on the same page
- Fixed an issue where layer order changed when replacing with an instance

plugins.name: RAO - Compliance Checker
plugins.description:
In a few clicks, checks Figma designs for regulatory compliance across global financial regulators:

  1. FCA (UK 🇬🇧)
  2. ESMA (EU 🇪🇺)
  3. SEC (USA 🇺🇸)
  4. FDIC (USA 🇺🇸)
  5. OCC (USA 🇺🇸)
  6. AMF (FR 🇫🇷)
  7. SEBI (India 🇮🇳)
  8. BaFin (Germany 🇩🇪)
  9. SCA (UAE 🇦🇪)
  10. BCB (Brazil 🇧🇷)
  11. MAS (SG 🇸🇬)
  12. FINMA (Switzerland 🇨🇭)
  13. CNBV (Mexico 🇲🇽)
  14. MFSA (Malta 🇲🇹)
  15. CySEC (Cyprus 🇨🇾)


How to Use

1. Select the Figma frame or element you want to check

2. Choose your target regulator

3. Click "Review Designs"

4. Easy to action compliance recommendations in seconds!


Features

  1. Specific product design feedback
  2. Detailed citation of relevant regulations
plugins.tagline: Global compliance at your fingertips

plugins.name: Variable Length Lorem Ipsum
plugins.description:
Most text generator plugins let you specify a single number for the word count. However, sometimes you want to specify a range instead, to introduce variability, and create more realistic results (realistic for lorem ipsum text, that is)


Features:

  1. Generates lorem ipsum text with the option of varied lengths.
  2. Enter a single number (e.g., "10") for fixed word count or a range (e.g., "5-10") for random variation within limits.
  3. Optionally add punctuation for generated text (default: off).
  4. Optionally auto-close the plugin after generating text (default: off).
  5. Supports your system setting for light or dark mode.


Roadmap:

  1. Save user preferences for future sessions.
  2. Allow custom text input for generation.
plugins.tagline: Specify a range of lengths for your lorem ipsum text

plugins.name: Sierotki Eliminator
plugins.description:
Sierotki Eliminator tackles a common issue in Polish typography known as "sierotki" (literally "orphans"). In Polish texts, single-letter words like "a", "i", "o", "u", "w", or "z" at the end of a line are considered typographic errors.


This plugin automatically replaces the space after these single-letter words with a non-breaking space, ensuring they always stay with the following word. By eliminating "sierotki", it enhances the visual appeal and readability of your Polish text in Figma designs.


Whether you're a Polish designer or working on Polish-language projects, Sierotki Eliminator helps you maintain proper typography.
plugins.tagline: Remove single-letter words at the end of a line

This plugin automatically replaces the space after these single-letter words with a non-breaking space, ensuring they always stay with the following word. By eliminating "sierotki", it enhances the visual appeal and readability of your Polish text in Figma designs.


Whether you're a Polish designer or working on Polish-language projects, Sierotki Eliminator helps you maintain proper typography.
105512.tagline: Remove single-letter words at the end of a line

plugins.name: Fontastic
plugins.description:
Find the fonts you can't locate, hidden in unknown or messy files.


Have you ever opened a project only to find you have no idea what fonts were used? With our plugin, you can quickly and easily locate those hidden typefaces that complicate your work. Forget digging through messy files and wasting valuable time—uncover what once seemed impossible with just one click. Make your workflow faster and more efficient! ⚡


  1. 🔎 Have you been handed a file with no clues about its fonts?
  2. ⚡️ Are you looking to save hours of work while reviewing text?
  3. 🤖 Would you like an assistant that reveals hidden fonts in a single click?


Say goodbye to frustration and hello to a smoother creative process! 🎉

plugins.name: Background Color Generator
plugins.description:
Summary:

This plugin is ideal for B2B products where you want to integrate a client’s branding color into background designs while maintaining accessibility and strong visual contrast.


How to use:

Pick a color using the hue slider or a HEX code. Select the layer you want to apply the color to, then simply click the button to apply it. The plugin generates light and dark variations with the same hue.


Accessibility Compliance:

This plugin follows the WCAG 2.1 guidelines for color contrast:

  1. The light color is optimized for contrast against 87% black (#161616), and the dark color against white (#FFFFFF).
  2. For normal text (below 18pt bold / 24pt regular), the minimum contrast ratio is 4.5:1.
  3. For large text (18pt bold or 24pt regular and above), the minimum contrast ratio is 3:1.
  4. The generated light and dark color combinations exceed these minimum requirements, ensuring better readability and accessibility for users with visual impairments.


(Note: I made this plugin from Ai integrated in VS code. If you want to know more about what I do at work, you can check Daidai )
plugins.tagline: Color generator for light and dark backgrounds.

131068.description:

Accessibility Compliance:

  1. The light color is optimized for contrast against 87% black (#161616), and the dark color against white (#FFFFFF).

plugins.name: Pictomate Icons
plugins.description:
Precise, elegant, and consistent icons for designers


Pictomate is a Figma plugin that offers a carefully crafted set of SVG icons — designed for real products, design systems, and teams that care about clarity and consistency.


• Smart search

• Production-ready quality

• Distraction-free workflow


Whether you're building onboarding flows, dashboards, or pricing pages, these icons are made to just work - without visual noise or clutter.


New icon sets and improvements are on the way. Feel free to share feedback or suggestions!


For any questions or custom licensing needs, feel free to reach out: hello@pictomate.com

plugins.name: Archiver
plugins.description:
Archiver is a streamlined utility that helps you declutter your Figma workspace without losing valuable design history. With a single click, it automatically moves selected elements to a dedicated Archive page, organizing them chronologically by date.


Unlike manual archiving, this plugin:

  1. Preserves all properties including auto layout, components, and text styling
  2. Intelligently arranges archived items by date for easy retrieval
  3. Handles any element type (frames, components, vectors, text, etc.)
  4. Works with batch selections for efficient cleanup
  5. Maintains a clear naming convention with date stamps


Perfect for design teams that need to keep their working files clean while maintaining access to previous iterations, explorations, or unused concepts. Simply select what you want to archive, run the plugin, and continue designing with a cleaner workspace.
plugins.tagline: Organize Design History: One-Click Element Archiving

128151.name: Archiver
128151.description:
Archiver is a streamlined utility that helps you declutter your Figma workspace without losing valuable design history. With a single click, it automatically moves selected elements to a dedicated Archive page, organizing them chronologically by date.

Perfect for design teams that need to keep their working files clean while maintaining access to previous iterations, explorations, or unused concepts. Simply select what you want to archive, run the plugin, and continue designing with a cleaner workspace.
128151.release_notes:
Key fixes:

Added await figma.loadAllPagesAsync() at the beginning to ensure all pages are loaded
Added await archivePage.loadAsync() when finding the Archive page
Added null checks before accessing archivePage.children
Made the code more defensive with additional checks throughout
128151.tagline: Organize Design History: One-Click Element Archiving

plugins.name: State Machines
plugins.description:
Create state machines and integrate them directly into your designs.


What is a state machine?


Think of a state machine as a way to organize all the different "states" your design can be in. For example, a form might have states like "empty," "filled," "submitting," or "error." State machines help you clearly define these states and the rules for moving between them, making complex interactions more manageable.


---


This plugin is experimental. Contributions and feature requests welcome: github.com/colebemis/figma-state-machines

accepted.name: Cole Bemis
accepted.description: Building things for people who build things. R&D at GitHub Next

plugins.tagline: Design complex interactions with state machines

plugins.name: Absurd Ipsum
plugins.description:
Embrace the Absurdity in Your Design!

Fill the void with chaotic, hilarious placeholder text—because why settle for boring when you can have weird?


Absurd Ipsum does exactly what it says—generate random paragraphs, usernames, quotes, error messages, and headings for your designs.


Preview the madness, copy the text to your clipboard, and unleash it wherever you like!


Enjoy the randomness—maybe you'll laugh, or at least wonder if your coffee mug is plotting against you.
plugins.tagline: Just like Lorem Ipsum but with a pinch of absurdity for your designs.

plugins.name: Find and Replace Screens
plugins.description:
Find and Replace Screens is a tool designed to streamline the process of updating screens in Figma with just one click. Whether you're transitioning from wireframes to final UI designs or updating screens across an entire flow, this plugin saves you time by keeping your layout, connectors, and arrows intact. No more manual re-positioning or reconnecting screens!


Key features:

  1. One-Click screen replacement: Update multiple instances of the same screen with a single action, ideal for projects where the same screen is used in multiple places.
  2. Preserves layout and flow: Replacing a screen won't disturb its surrounding elements, including arrows, connectors, and positions within the flow.
  3. Flexible use case: While perfect for wireframe-to-UI transitions, the plugin is also useful for updating iterations of any design screen without losing structure.


How to Use:

  1. Choose the new screen you want to use (UI design, updated iteration, etc.).
  2. Select the screen(s) you want to replace in the flow.
  3. Click "Replace Screen" to swap the content while maintaining connections and layout positions.


Limitations:

  1. For best results, ensure the new screens are similar in size to the ones being replaced, as large size differences may affect layout alignment.
  2. Does not adjust connectors/arrows if the new screen's size significantly differs from the original.
plugins.tagline: Find and Replace Screens across your project with one click while keeping connections intact.

114360.name: Find and Replace Screens
114360.description:
Find and Replace Screens is a tool designed to streamline the process of updating screens in Figma with just one click. Whether you're transitioning from wireframes to final UI designs or updating screens across an entire flow, this plugin saves you time by keeping your layout, connectors, and arrows intact. No more manual re-positioning or reconnecting screens!


Key features:

  1. One-Click screen replacement: Update multiple instances of the same screen with a single action, ideal for projects where the same screen is used in multiple places.
  2. Preserves layout and flow: Replacing a screen won't disturb its surrounding elements, including arrows, connectors, and positions within the flow.
  3. Flexible use case: While perfect for wireframe-to-UI transitions, the plugin is also useful for updating iterations of any design screen without losing structure.


How to Use:

  1. Choose the new screen you want to use (UI design, updated iteration, etc.).
  2. Select the screen(s) you want to replace in the flow.
  3. Click "Replace Screen" to swap the content while maintaining connections and layout positions.


Limitations:

  1. For best results, ensure the new screens are similar in size to the ones being replaced, as large size differences may affect layout alignment.
  2. Does not adjust connectors/arrows if the new screen's size significantly differs from the original.
114360.tagline: Find and Replace Screens across your project with one click while keeping connections intact.

plugins.name: Interactive Input Fields & Form Prototyping with MagicInput
plugins.description:
Turn any static design into a fully interactive, keyboard-driven prototype, without writing a single line of code

---

MagicInput automates the creation of input fields in your Figma prototypes by:


  1. 🔁 Cloning a base input component or instance
  2. 🔗 Binding values to Figma Variables (value, length, placeholder visibility)
  3. ⌨️ Adding keypress-based reactions for typing, backspace, and more
  4. 🎯 Enabling click-to-focus behavior
  5. 🚀 Generating full keyboard logic with conditional visibility
  6. 🧼 Cleaning up unused variables automatically

---

Whether you're building forms, authentication flows, or search UIs, MagicInput helps simulate realistic input behavior, directly inside Figma.

- Supports:

a–z, A–Z, 0–9, space, backspace, escape, and special characters (!@#$%^&*()_+, etc.)

Perfect for:

  1. UX demos with real input behavior
  2. Usability testing without dev handoff
  3. Interactive form mockups
  4. Keyboard-driven prototype logic


Skip the click-through illusion. Make your inputs feel real.


Try it on your design now and start building smarter Figma prototypes with true input interactivity.


🚧 Beta Disclaimer

We're actively improving MagicInput—some features may still be buggy.

Help us make it better by reporting issues at feedback-form.

accepted.name: Jovan
accepted.description:
UX designer crafting intuitive, scalable, human‑first products. Structured, hands‑on maker untangling complexity. 
---
Builds Figma tools for fun after hours.

plugins.tagline: Bring realistic typing, validation & responsive input components to your Figma prototypes

plugins.name: Chroma Forge
plugins.description:
Chroma Forge for Figma


A powerful color selection plugin for Figma that provides an intuitive color wheel and advanced color harmony tools to create consistent color palettes.


Features


Interactive Color Wheel

  1. High-precision color selection with a fully interactive color wheel
  2. Adjustable brightness and saturation sliders
  3. Real-time color preview
  4. HEX code input with validation


Color Harmony Tools

  1. Create cohesive color palettes using different harmony types:
  2. Analogous: Colors that are adjacent to each other on the color wheel
  3. Triad: Three colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  4. Complementary: Colors opposite each other on the color wheel
  5. Split Complementary: A main color and two colors adjacent to its complement
  6. Square: Four colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  7. Compound: A combination of complementary and analogous harmonies
  8. Mono: A single color with various shades
  9. Custom: Create your own custom harmony by placing markers freely


Flexible Color Selection

  1. Select 2-6 colors at once (depending on harmony type)
  2. Drag markers on the wheel to fine-tune your color selection
  3. Automatic contrast adjustment for optimal visibility


Figma Integration

  1. Apply selected colors directly to selected elements
  2. Create color styles from your palette
  3. Generate color variables with automatic shade variants (10% to 100% brightness)
  4. Intelligent naming system for organizing colors


How to Use


Select a Harmony Type: Choose from the dropdown menu to define how colors relate to each other

Select Number of Colors: Choose how many colors you want in your palette (2-6)

Choose Your Base Color: Click and drag on the color wheel or enter a HEX code

Adjust Saturation and Brightness: Use the sliders to fine-tune your colors

Apply Colors: Use the buttons to:

  1. Apply directly to selected elements
  2. Add to Figma color styles
  3. Add to Figma variables (with automatic shade creation)


Email me

Behance

Dribbble

LinkedIn

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Create perfect palettes with color harmony tools

plugins.name: Copy SVG to Webflow
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you copy an SVG from Figma and paste it directly into your Webflow page.


Options:

  1. Use currentColor for fills
  2. Use currentColor for strokes
  3. Pass custom classes to Webflow (in 'class' attribute)
  4. Set Width and Height to 100%
  5. Set preserveAspectRatio


Enjoy!
plugins.tagline: Copy SVGs from Figma to Webflow with Classes

  1. Use currentColor for fills
  2. Use currentColor for strokes
  3. Pass custom classes to Webflow (in 'class' attribute)
  4. Set Width and Height to 100%
  5. Set preserveAspectRatio


Enjoy!
124623.release_notes: Added option to set preserveAspectRatio, changed adding of classes to 'class' attribute to prevent duplicate class names, added the ability to set height and width to 100%
124623.tagline: Copy SVGs from Figma to Webflow with Classes

plugins.name: AI Real Data Generator
plugins.description:
Description

Testing with real-life data is crucial, but setting up prototypes manually is time-consuming. With AI Real Data Generator Figma plugin, simply provide AI with your instructions and an example—using your Gemini API key, it will instantly generate and replace data in your design, making prototyping seamless and efficient.


How to Use:

  1. Add the AI Real Data Generator plugin in Figma.
  2. Enter your Gemini API key to enable data generation.
  3. Provide instructions on the type of real-life data you need.
  4. Provide an example or data template to guide AI generation.
  5. AI instantly generates and replaces data directly in your Figma design.


Key Features:


  1. Instant data generation: AI quickly fills in real-world data in seconds.
  2. Customizable: Provide specific instructions and examples to match your needs.
  3. Seamless integration: Data replaces existing placeholders in your design automatically.
  4. Efficiency boost: Save time on manual data entry during prototyping.
  5. Powered by Gemini API: Leverage advanced AI for precise data generation, enabled with the free gemini-2.0-flash modal
plugins.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma designs with real-world data using AI-powered precision

plugins.name: Convert To Bionic Writing
plugins.description:
Unlock Faster, More Focused Reading with Bionic Reading: This plugin applies the Bionic Reading method (bionic-reading.com) to your text layers, dynamically bolding the initial letters of words to improve reading speed and comprehension. By leveraging the natural fixation points of the eye, Bionic Reading helps readers process text more efficiently with less cognitive effort. This plugin works best with fonts that offer multiple weight variations.


Key Features:


  1. Converts selected text layers to Bionic Reading format.
  2. Optimizes text for faster and more focused reading.
  3. Ideal for improving readability and engagement.



Open Source: github.com/mrayubmuhammad/Convert-To-Bionic-Writing-Figma-Plugin



Created by d3flow (www.d3flow.com) using Claude.ai.

Note: Requires fonts with multiple weight options for optimal performance.

accepted.name: Ayub Muhammad
accepted.description: Cofounder at d3flow where we Design, Develop and Distribute in flow.

accepted.name: d3flow
accepted.description: Design, Develop, Distribute in flow with d3flow

plugins.tagline: Focused Reading, Better Typography

plugins.name: Icon Resizer
plugins.description:
The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
plugins.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

118276.name: Icon Resizer

Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.

plugins.name: VV-Text
plugins.description:
海外项目设计师看过来！

使用对照表翻译设计稿时，是不是只能反复的复制粘贴？

现在只需两步轻松搞定，快来试试吧！


第一步：一键导出原文

（导出的CSV文件交给专业的翻译人员进行翻译）

第二步：一键导入翻译


轻松设计，轻松摸鱼 ^_^


-------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attention, overseas project designers!

When translating design drafts using a comparison table, do you have to rely on repeated copying and pasting?

Now it can be easily done in just two steps. Come and give it a try!


Step 1: One-click export of original text.


(The exported CSV file is handed over to professional translators for translation.)


Step 2: One-click import of translation.

101788.name: FigPad
101788.description:
FigPad is the simplest way to create visually pleasing and detailed design notes and comments for your figma design needs!


Features:

  1. Sleek and professional design that is just the right amount of eye-catching.
  2. Friendly and intuitive user interface of the plugin, allowing for quick and easy creation of comments.
  3. Simple and informative notes with various clear categories/topics of the note.
  4. Personalised touch with the integration of user name and (optiona) profile picture.
101788.tagline: A simple and easy way to create aesthetic, personalized and informative notes!

plugins.name: StageUp
plugins.description: StageUp allows you to assign statuses to pages in your Figma project with a single click. Choose from options like 'Approved', 'Requires Changes', or 'Work in Progress' to keep track of the current state of your designs.
plugins.tagline: Quick page status updates in Figma

101950.name: StageUp
101950.description: StageUp allows you to assign statuses to pages in your Figma project with a single click. Choose from options like 'Approved', 'Requires Changes', or 'Work in Progress' to keep track of the current state of your designs.
101950.release_notes:
Release Notes v1.1.2
Fixed: An issue where applying statuses to elements with numerical names would incorrectly modify or remove the numerical values. Elements with names starting with digits now retain their names correctly when a status is applied.
101950.tagline: Quick page status updates in Figma

plugins.name: Lindi for Tawakkalna
plugins.description:
Lindi revolutionizes the way UI/UX designs are created by leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to automate and enhance the design process. Users can rapidly prototype, iterate, and finalize visually appealing and user-friendly UI/UX designs.


This plugin is solely made for Tawakkalna Services allowing entities to build flows and designs with Tawakkalna's Design System rules.


The Plugin generates and transfers ready made designs from Lindi - The AI Designer to Figma allowing designers to view, create, and modify the contents of the files in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Design Smarter, Build Faster: Empowering UI/UX with AI precision.

118427.release_notes: Updated components and added new ones.
118427.tagline: Design Smarter, Build Faster: Empowering UI/UX with AI precision.

plugins.name: Kaiju Asset Delivery
plugins.description: Deliver your design tokens or icon assets as a pull request straight to your Github repos. We transform tokens or icons for the destination framework i.e. Android Compose or iOS SwiftUI.

plugins.name: Unit Converter Pro - Measurement Calculator for Figma
plugins.description:
Unit Converter Pro - The Ultimate Measurement Calculator for Figma

Transform your design workflow with the most comprehensive unit conversion tool available for Figma. Unit Converter Pro instantly converts between any measurement units across 8 different categories, saving you valuable design time.

Features:

• Convert between ALL common design units: pixels, inches, cm, points, and more

• Support for 8 conversion categories: Length, Area, Volume, Weight, Temperature, Time, Speed, and Data

• Real-time conversion as you type - see results instantly

• Clean, intuitive interface that matches Figma's design language

• Works directly within your Figma workspace - no need to switch between apps

Perfect for:

• UI/UX designers working across different measurement systems

• Design teams collaborating internationally

• Creating responsive designs that require precise unit conversions

• Print and digital designers who need to convert between physical and digital units

• Anyone who wants to save time on manual calculations

Stop wasting time with manual calculations or switching between apps. Unit Converter Pro handles all your measurement conversion needs in one place, letting you focus on what matters most - your designs.

Convert any unit with just a few clicks and design with confidence!

plugins.tagline: Designer's Essential Tool: Convert Between All Measurement Units Instantly

plugins.name: Blink Notes
plugins.description:
Blink Notes is the fastest way to capture ideas and attach notes directly to your Figma frames — instantly and effortlessly.


With Blink Notes, you can:

  1. Quickly create notes linked to specific frames
  2. Organize thoughts without breaking your design flow
  3. Keep your feedback, ideas, and to-dos right where you need them
  4. Stay focused with a clean, minimal, distraction-free interface


Designed for speed, collaboration, and creativity, BlinkNotes helps you streamline your design process and never lose an idea again.


Add Blink Notes to your workflow and start designing smarter today.

accepted.name: Siddhant giri
accepted.description: Product Designer and a Frontend Developer from India.

plugins.tagline: Capture and link notes to your Figma frames — in a blink.
